title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Short Trips
content: Embark on a surreal experience helping Lamar and Franklin lay down the groundwork for LD Organics, Lamar’s aboveboard weed business in Short Trips. Jump straight into the action by bringing up your iFruit and navigating to Quick Join > Contact Missions > Short Trip. For taking part, you’ll earn 2X GTA$ and RP through April 24.
